data.title: Charlotte Hornets Roster
data.meta_description: Charlotte Hornets scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Alexis Ajinca was selected as the #20 pick in the First Round of the 2008 NBA Draft by the Charlotte Hornets. Alexis Ajinca signed a multi-year contract with the Charlotte Hornets on July 3, 2008.

D.J. Augustin was selected as the #9 pick in the First Round of the 2008 NBA Draft by the Charlotte Hornets. D.J. Augustin signed a multi-year contract with the Charlotte Hornets on July 3, 2008.

Derrick Brown was selected as the #10 pick in the Second Round of the 2009 NBA Draft by the Charlotte Hornets. Derrick Brown signed a multi-year contract with the Charlotte Hornets on July 13, 2009.

Raymond Felton was selected as the #5 pick in the First Round of the 2005 NBA Draft by the Charlotte Hornets. Raymond Felton signed a multi-year contract with the Charlotte Hornets on July 7, 2005. Raymond Felton re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the Charlotte Hornets on September 22, 2009.

Gerald Henderson was selected as the #12 pick in the First Round of the 2009 NBA Draft by the Charlotte Hornets. Gerald Henderson signed a multi-year contract with the Charlotte Hornets on July 7, 2009.

Tyson Chandler was acquired in a trade by the Charlotte Hornets from the New Orleans Pelicans on July 28, 2009.

Boris Diaw was acquired in a trade by the Charlotte Hornets from the Phoenix Suns on December 10, 2008.

DeSagana Diop was acquired in a trade by the Charlotte Hornets from the Dallas Mavericks on January 16, 2009.

Stephen Jackson was acquired in a trade by the Charlotte Hornets from the Golden State Warriors on November 16, 2009.

Nazr Mohammed was acquired in a trade by the Charlotte Hornets from the Detroit Pistons on December 14, 2007.

Theo Ratliff was acquired in a trade by the Charlotte Hornets from the San Antonio Spurs on February 18, 2010.

Tyrus Thomas was acquired in a trade by the Charlotte Hornets from the Chicago Bulls on February 18, 2010.
